Steps.StepString: Access the source URL in the browser

Substeps.SubstepString: Access the source URL
Open the URL in a browser

Steps.StepString: Open the Browser Devtools to view the website's source code

Substeps.SubstepString: Open the Browser Devtools
Access the website's source code

Steps.StepString: Locate the function addCaptcha() in the JavaScript code, this function creates the captchas and makes them move

Substeps.SubstepString: Search for the function addCaptcha() in the JavaScript code
Identify the functionality of the addCaptcha() function

Steps.StepString: Modify the function addCaptcha() in your devtools, remove the loop() function to stop the captchas from moving

Substeps.SubstepString: Open the function addCaptcha() in the devtools
Locate the loop() function within addCaptcha()
Remove the loop() function from addCaptcha()

Steps.StepString: Call the function addCaptcha() manually to add 5 captchas on your screen

Substeps.SubstepString: Access the JavaScript console in the devtools
Call the addCaptcha() function
Repeat the previous substep 4 more times

Steps.StepString: Click the captcha boxes until you successfully get all 5 captchas

Substeps.SubstepString: Locate the captcha boxes on the screen
Click on a captcha box
Repeat the previous substep 4 more times

Steps.StepString: After collecting all 5 captchas, click on 'GET FLAG' to obtain the challenge flag

Substeps.SubstepString: Verify if all 5 captchas are collected
Locate the 'GET FLAG' button
Click on the 'GET FLAG' button

Steps.StepString: The flag is displayed on the screen, copy it

Substeps.SubstepString: Verify if the flag is displayed on the screen
Select and copy the flag
